events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but it does not fit me properly. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under refund due to customer's request for money back because of sizing issues.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and a picture of the jacket to help us process your refund more quickly?
Thank you for your response. My order number is 7845123 and attached is a photo showing the jacket's label and condition.
We have reviewed your information and approved your refund request. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the prompt reply and approval. I'll ship the jacket back today using the barcode you sent over.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund to your original payment method. You should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting customer support and we hope to serve you again in the future.
